name: Pin+Poof
description:
Pin+Poof is a 3D adventure platformer created by https://nrgcore.com for the official Kenney Jam of 2022.

In this mini game you control Pinpin the panda who is in love with Poofpoof the pig. Poofpoof loves pretty flowers and asked Pinpin to go gather some for her. But he, unfortunately, get distracted while eating bamboo and get lost...

Help Pinpin to find its way back to Poofpoof and bring her back as many flowers as possible to make her happy!

Explore the world and gather flowers for points; coins for extra hearts and eat Bamboo to grow biGGER! As the size of the Pin expand he can then push heavier objects, jump higher and make it easier to defeat the baddies that try to stop him on his way back to the Poof! 

As a side effect, eating too much will make the Pin slower and harder to control. Traps are going to be harder to avoid and moving platforms will become more unstable...

[Game controls]
Move - WASD
Zoom - RF
Camera - ARROWS
Jump - SPACEBAR

The game was entirely made using the rapid prototyping real-time development environment of NRG! The FULL project including the source code and assets created for the Jam will be available for FREE at https://nrgcore.com as soon as rating period is over.
